name: Gino Munaron
introduction: Gino Munaron (born 2 April 1928 and died 22 November 2009) was an Italian Formula One driver who drove a Cooper for Scuderia Eugenio Castellotti in four races in 1960. He made his debut in Maserati he privately entered for the 1960 Argentine Grand Prix. He did not score any championship points in his career.
